website_summaries.verdict: Doubling as a pour spout and  handy storage container, this multi-functional product impresses all around.
pros: Base is made of glass for a quality look and durability
Built-in pouring spout located in juice reamer
Includes an attachable lid for storage
Extremely simple to disassemble and clean
cons: A few customers had issues connecting the lid to the glass jar

customer_reviews.title: Easy Juicing, easy Cleanup, Use with Mason Jar for more volume
customer_reviews.text: I got this for squeezing orange juice off the trees in my yard. Very simple to use, gets all the juice, easy to store in the frig for later. Also, I figured out that the apparatus fits on top of a wide mouth Mason Jar which lets me do a dozen or more oranges at a time if I'm having guests !
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: The glass on this broke while I was juicing the lemons and glass pieces fell into the lemon juice. It broke on only the second use. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE JUICER WITH JAR
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a manual juicer as a gift for my grandson. He can be obsessive about juicing citrus fruit. I would have preferred a larger container, but this one is just okay. The product details said it would juice lemons, limes and oranges. I think it will only work for small oranges. My grandson opened it and went right to the kitchen to begin using it. It is as advertised except that you may not realize how small it is until you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Thought I had found the perfect 'simple' lemon juicer
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had found the perfect 'simple' lemon juicer, and it's not bad, but a couple of changes in the design could have easily made this a 5 star purchase. Should have made the 'extra' lid fit right on top of the main white juicer piece. That thing is too hard to screw on. the threading has to be just right and keeps slipping. Also would have been nice to allow the middle yellow juicer piece to flip over and fit inside the main jar so that I could travel easier with this as one unit. But overall, I do like that it's glass and includes the lid for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Davis

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is almost perfect for juicing my daily lemons. Couldn't bring myself to order a metal press made in China so after struggling with bare hand squeezing for months, I bought this one. Such a breeze. I get much more juice out of my lemons and even when a seed gets thru, the slight lip keeps it from pouring out with the juice most of the time. The screw-on lid makes storage of extra juice a breeze but I love it for storing the other half of my lemon for the next day. This Prepara Chef's Citrus Juicer makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol JLH

customer_reviews.title: fav purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: I am SUPER pleased with this citrus juicer. After reading dozens of reviews, I pulled the trigger on this one because it is glass and has juice storage capabilities. Turns out, this is honestly my favorite purchase of the year from Amazon! My family has used it multiple times, and the parts fit together and come apart seamlessly. Others have mentioned that the glass broke. If the glass were to break - because it is glass - then I would happily spend $10 for another one. Well designed. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: a young mom

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn't really fit.
customer_reviews.text: The screw on top is difficult to get the threads right. The little lip at the top of the jar you have to make sure to clean. After I ordered this I found it for sale at the local grocery by the aluminum pans. I think next time I will try an electric one. -But still I use it a lot and keep the lemon juice in the fridge for a few days after I squeeze it , so it must be a good basic design.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: Very effective juice with own storage container
customer_reviews.text: It looks like not much different than the citrus juicers. But already upon the first use, it proved to be much more effective that others we have used. Easy to clean with screw off retainer for the reamer. All parts dishwater safe, though very easy to clean by hand. The glass collecting base also has a screw on cap for interim storage of the squeezed juice. A good size to hold enough for most recipes, and it fits the hand well so as to hold it stabile while juicing. All in a well designed and well constructed kitchen tool. Get one and you won't regret it. We don't.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest ELF

customer_reviews.title: Great small juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Great small juicer. I had a old style glass juicer, it works but the Prepara does a better job at getting all the juice out of the orange or lemon, the sharper edge of the juicing element doe a better job than the less sharp glass juicer. I don't have any major problem removing the yellow juicer from the cup, minor the first couple times sure, but I'd rather have a good fit than a loose one. The base that doubles as a cup lid in good too. My review is based off 30ish lemons and 20 oranges.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: We Love This one
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of lemons and have several kinds of these juicers. This is our new favorite. It juices completely with very little effort (great for arthritic hands) and really appreciate the screw on lid to store extra juice in advance in refrigerator. Small handy size....perfect for us. Like that jar is glass for storing juice in. Highly recommend. I plan to buy one for my sister who also uses lemons & limes for citrus flavored water.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary of buying this because of a few negative reviews that I read; but I couldn't find anything that I liked more than this so I ordered it. My husband drinks limes with his water every day. He loves this. It easy to assemble and disassemble. The storage lid works well and it is easy to clean. The size is perfect for limes (larger ones as well as key limes); however, I think this would be too small for oranges.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely pleased with this juicer. I am get 3 times the juice I did from the hand grip squeezer. The only drawbacks, hence the 4 stars rather than 5, is that small pips still get into the juice and you can't store it all together if you are retaining juice for a later use. I love the glass bowl though as it retains the lemon flavor much longer in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: LVB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this juicer
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little juicer. Perfect for what I need. Love that it’s glass and comes with a cover to save juice. I read previous reviews about the top fitting on a mason jar *it does! I also read about it not pouring well but if you leave the white part with the lip on and pour it’s perfect no spills. I use it daily for my lemon and orange juice and I absolutely love it. So perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: No juice left behind!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the wedge works so well, and you can pour really easily. It's great that the bowl is glass and that you can put the lid on top to store extra juice. We use a lot of lemon and lime juices, so this makes sure we get all the juice from our citrus. My only improvement would be to make a spout to pour from after storage. You would have to put the lid back on with the pour spout every time you want some juice, then clean it which is a pain. You can pour directly from the glass bowl, but it doesn't pour very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I Love this thing so much
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. Allows me to juice lemons and just keep the juice for the week. Honestly, a huge time saver. My only gripe is that I can’t keep the poring top and screw top on together- this would make storage easier as I need to both cover the juice and pour it frequently. If this is ever fixed, it will be best little guy ever.
customer_reviews.author: dev6757

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome juicer, I love using it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent juicer. I can not think of a single thing deficient on this design, and even the color. This is easy to clean, easy to use, easy to pour..... I have even used the cover and nothing spilled. Good job on the design of this product, they really thought it out and fulfilled that promise. I absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.author: H Duhaime

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a wood reamer which required fishing the seeds out of the juice. This juicer strains the seeds and most of the pulp out and has a separate lid for sealing the jar to store any leftover juice. I had a plastic one of these years ago, but the part that held the juice was white plastic. The clear glass jar is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Crjsahm

customer_reviews.title: prepara glass citrus juicer
customer_reviews.text: Nice , handy product....Small and easy to clean and store. This is my second order as I dropped the glass container on the kitchen floor and it busted but I still have the lid from the old one....I like glass, only not when I'm clumsy and drop things, but glass is the way to go.....
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% glass
customer_reviews.text: This is misidentified as a "glass citrus juicer" in its title. I should have read the details more closely. The container is glass, but the reamer is plastic. I could have gotten a plastic juicer off the shelf anywhere, and for less money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice small compact little juicer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want some big juice machine or another huge kitchen item just to squeeze a lemon or orange. This is perfect. Works so well and is small and easy to put away. The top part screws off for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, but tricky juicing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine and versatile home lemon juicer. The 'Point' of the yellow juicer is rather steep, though. One has to squeeze the lemon against the mount to get the maximum juice per fruit-half. Also, a measure on the cup portion would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to extract lemon and lime juice. It's easy to use and clean. I like that it comes with a lid which is a convenient way to store the leftover juice. I would buy again and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kurtmc

customer_reviews.title: practical juices that can go in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: This is a very practical solution for a dedicated kitchen product. I don't recall getting a lid with mine, however, which does cut the storage capability from mine. So check the packaging for the lid! I completely missed it.
customer_reviews.author: 0xyjen

customer_reviews.title: Great little juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little juicer. Have had it for months now and works very well. Gets all the juice and pulp with easy pressure. Convenient cover to store half lemon or orange. Small seeds will go through juicer but easy to remove. This is for someone that only uses one lemon or orange at a time. It's what I wanted and works perfectly. Glass cup is heavy and good quality. Yellow plastic insert seems light, but it really juices well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AMaes

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it. well designed and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought it sooner! I was worry that it's flimsy but it's made of glass and thick plastic. Not only it's easy to use and clean, I really like how you could seal it after squeezing the juice. it's really convenient and thoughtful design.
customer_reviews.author: Smarlie Chen

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it does the job of juicing well ...
customer_reviews.text: This is finally my citrus juicer. I love it because it does the job of juicing well AND the upper part cleans in seconds when rinsing. No stones sticking to to it (I am stressed out about them because when overlooked they destroy dishwashers) All the parts are dishwasher safe. 👍🏻. I bought two other ones in the last two years. Both of them are in the garbage 😐
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent....
customer_reviews.text: Just prefect and easy for everyone in our family to use. Works great, love the storage, again, just perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Reader's Edyn

customer_reviews.title: Prepara Glass Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this for juicing limes but it works great for me. I can squeeze every bit of juice out of them with this juicer. I don't use it with the storage lid so cannot comment on that complaint that I read about prior to purchasing. No issues with cleaning after use. Completely pleased with my selection of this product.
customer_reviews.author: K Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap little juicer
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use. Sometimes the white collar gets stuck and is hard to unscrew. But it can still be cleaned and used if that happens. This little juicer works great, keeps seeds out of the juice, and removes as much juice from lemons as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Chemists

customer_reviews.title: Must buy glass juicer
customer_reviews.text: My old plastic juicer has corroded the cup surface after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Catnap

customer_reviews.title: Handy gadget
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. So easy to make juice and save extra in fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dimmich

customer_reviews.title: I like juice
customer_reviews.text: Always loved this idea for a measuring cup and juicer. Do t know why it disappeared for a awhile.
customer_reviews.author: nikitas skopelitis

customer_reviews.title: Great manual juicer with lid!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works great and it has a lid to save juice for later use.
customer_reviews.author: TM Donithan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, disappointing product over basic fault
customer_reviews.text: The lid of this juicer would not seat tightly, thereby making this useless to me for storing the squeezed juice. Very disappointing, but I will have to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rolnick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool
customer_reviews.text: The perfect tool to squeeze lemon juice and store it. High quality and durable item.
customer_reviews.author: Chetan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great that it comes with an easy to use lid to store extra juice!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Stanton

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite by far!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite by far, and I've bought several over the years. The sharp and hard plastic ridges make all the difference. Gets all the juice with no struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Gayleonthego

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Having a lid is great, and it is just the perfect size for oranges, not just lemons.
customer_reviews.author: Joohyun Park

customer_reviews.title: This is the Best juicer I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best juicer I have purchased. I love that I can quickly store the unused portion with the handy little lid!
customer_reviews.author: NITA

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy little hand juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little hand juicer. It's just right for smaller amounts when you don't want to clean a bigger juicer. The plastic reamer screws securely onto the glass base. You can pour the juice into another glass or bowl without removing the orange lid because there is a pour spout on one side of it.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: Juice the way you like it
customer_reviews.text: It's good to use but small for me since I juice a lot of fruit on it. Simple to use, ready to drink out of it, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Willie L.

customer_reviews.title: The Best way to juice lemons
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of fresh lemon in cooking and have been using a lemon reamer but the seeds are a problem. A lemon/lime squeezer is too hard for me to use. This little gadget is just the ticket. I like that the jar is glass and the plastic top part really gets all the juice out of the lemon. And it catches the seeds! I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheery cute juicer
customer_reviews.text: The best juicer I've used. I had been wrangling with a lemon squeezer which was OK, but didn't seem to get all the juice. I'm so glad I ordered the Prepara juicer. It's designed so well: quickly gets all the juice, catches the seeds and keeps the juice in a container. Love it. Plus it's cheery cute.
customer_reviews.author: laurelissa

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little juicer. Easy to clean and love that there's a screw on top so you can store the extra juice in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Saves a few steps between squeezing, using and storing. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: OK, wish the  cap did not separate into 2
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why the manufacturers decided to make the yellow part of the cap separate from the white part. This is not helpful. The yellow part dislodges at inconvenient times. Spent too much money on this not to be more happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KHM27

customer_reviews.title: nice to be able to put the top on and ...
customer_reviews.text: works really well, nice to be able to put the top on and save in fridge for later
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my baking/cooking needs.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy little juicer for my many uses of citrus juices. Squeeze 'em and store the juice in the container for whenever I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia from CT

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great juicer! The reamer is quite pointy for plastic, so it really annihilates the lemon. I don't think you could get much more juice from your citrus with another tool. Plus it's cute and yellow, like sunshine and daffodils. It's easy to clean and, though I don't use it often, it's nice to have a lid to save extra juice if you don't use it all at once.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good feel. Took a bit to figure out how the top worked. lol
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Andree

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this little citrus juice. Just as advertised! The glass is very sturdy, I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Ivana C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice juicer
customer_reviews.text: It works great, my only complaint is that they should have made the lid to fit over the poring spout piece. Overall it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeeboy

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. It is easy to use. The lid allows to keep juice in a refrigerator. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Prime subscriber

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best juicer ever. We don’t bother with our electric juicer. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn P Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing time saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant invention and although it might not be as pretty as a crystal lemon juicer dish, it's WAY better!
customer_reviews.author: Cam H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.. For 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Got it in June, broke in September. I really liked the idea that I could keep the juice in here without using a second container. It did work great up until now. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tarmat

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I Just started drinking warm lemon water in the morning and at night. This is item is perfect since it is simple, easy to clean and juices the lemons with little effort. If a small seed sneaks through while juicing, just pour the juice into a mug through the detachable strainer to clear it out.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Owens

customer_reviews.title: VERY Handy!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for keeping at work to add lemon to my glass water bottle. If I have to cut a lemon but only use half in my water bottle I can store the rest in my mini fridge in the glass keeper. The reamer works well, and clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Peeper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to receive this product; however, the bottom glass broke before using it....have to find another cup/ container.
customer_reviews.author: Ajain

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS-IT IS MADE IN CHINA NOT ENGLAND AS IT ADVERTISES
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS MADE IN CHINA-NOT THE UK AS IT FALSELY ADVERTISES... IF THEY ARE LYING ABOUT THAT ...WHAT ELSE ARE THEY LYING ABOUT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gadget is nice, I like that it is glass but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is nice, I like that it is glass but it is on the small size. I wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: blueangel11

customer_reviews.title: Great little juicer
customer_reviews.text: Great little juicer... love the jar to collect juice and easily store left overs in the refridgerator with. Well thought out!
customer_reviews.author: coral

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent juicer. Does a great job and easily stores what you don't need right away.
customer_reviews.author: A Music Fan

customer_reviews.title: Fragile part
customer_reviews.text: I dropped the yellow juicer part after a few uses and the tab broke off. It shouldn't be that fragile. What is it made of? I ordered a replacement but I'm required to send the original back. That's a waste of time, money, and materials. I'd like to just send the broken piece back if you insist, or send a photo of the broken part.
customer_reviews.author: meadowbrookwoman

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, although a little more bulky than I would have preferred. But it is easy to set up and clean, and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the wife speaking, and this is a fantastic, well-structured, efficient juicer and storage container. Easy to use, quick to clean, and I love the addition of the pour spout.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph's mom

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice device, simple. I was even able to use for a grapefruit with a little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Minnita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great juicer. I had no idea my old one was such a pain until I bought this one. I'm a happy juicer :)
customer_reviews.author: buyin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for storing lemon juice for later
customer_reviews.text: If you keep twisting it will untwist it Again other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy350z

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I love lemon water, and this is so easy. Cleanup isn't bad either. I highly recommend this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: mrfulgi

customer_reviews.title: Glass jar
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Glass jar and able to store lemonade for a few days in the fridge. I squeeze 3 lemons and have them ready for my morning lemonades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The holes where the juice flows through is to big the seeds from the lemon falls through to.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen product i ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Much better than using a squeezer or hand squeezing. Feels like a quality product. Easily juices lemon, limes and small oranges. Definately a very useful kitchen tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: DD119

customer_reviews.title: The juicer works great. The only problem is the lid doesn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The juicer works great. The only problem is the lid doesn't fit on the jar correctly. I have to be careful to keep it from spilling
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: great product ....but
customer_reviews.text: only issue is that the wholes are too big, so the lemons seeds is going through
customer_reviews.author: iris dagan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Simple and nicely designed. I get more juice than my press and it’s easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: edward l metzger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with quality
customer_reviews.text: Live the glass and quality better than these plastic ones you buy at grocery stores
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works great. the fit of the screw on white lip ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. the fit of the screw on white lip isn't perfect, but is OK and love the lid for storing juice in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: mineguy@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish seeds from lemons didn't fall thru strainer into the glass jar.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for how I use it. Holds the juice of 3-4 lemons, use what you want and store the rest. Extracts 100% of the juice. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Saint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it - convenient, easy to use and clean, and looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient for a quick squeeze for drinks ... food ... and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Star shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device and easy to clean. It's hard to avoid getting seeds into the juice and it can leak and can leak sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Utada

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but don't have any measure on the glass:(
customer_reviews.author: melindaFitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: This could easily be remedied if the strainer openings were circular rather ...
customer_reviews.text: The slots in the strainer do not filter out many seeds from dropping into the jar; I have to fish them out with a spoon. This could easily be remedied if the strainer openings were circular rather than elongated slots. Also, the strainer is not very ergonomic to use. More specifically, it is awkward to hold onto with one hand when grinding the fruit with the other hand. I bought this strainer to replace a simple 2-piece plastic unit that I had obtained free from a citrus distributor about 40 years ago, which finally began to crack. I wish that I could find one that had that simple design again.
customer_reviews.author: K. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Works OK, But...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cleverly designed little juicer and it works okay for what it is. The yellow plastic part appears sufficiently sturdy for the task and the clear glass cup is also fine. My only complaint is that the white plastic lid that screws onto the glass cup (for storage in the fridge) is made of very thin material and the threading seems to be slightly "off" -- poorly engineered or poor quality plastic -- making it very difficult to properly align the threads to screw it onto the glass cup. This would be a five star item if the screw on cap had been properly designed or manufactured with better quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Brad

customer_reviews.title: Glass is best!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome! It got every bit of lemon juice from the fruit and no seeds. Washes well in the top drawer of my dishwasher and the lid is so useful because you can refrigerate leftovers. I don’t understand how some can’t get the screw top lid on. And if it arrives damaged that’s *not* the manufacturers fault but the shipper. And it’s GLASS not plastic! Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: E.A. M-Purdum

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.text: So I just unboxed it and put it to use with some “borrowed” limes from a neighbor’s tree. This product works better than any hand juicer because you have more control over the process of juicing. These guys truly deliver an exceptional product for the price. A glass collection jar, screw on cap to preserve the fruits of your labor, and a plastic cone for extracting the juice that fits nicely into it’s precise grooves ( plastic could’ve been more sturdy but for the price it’s great and I’m sure it’ll last awhile.) the ultimate citrus juice extractor for an unbeatable price (I’ve looked as I’m poor too.) You’re welcome, a high quality review for a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Small, strong and well-designed
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great juicer I just bought a second one. It's so smartly designed. The base keeps it from sliding and also serves as a storage lid. The reamer fits inside a pour spout, which all comes apart for cleaning, You can squeeze juice and keep any leftover juice in this just by removing the pour spout and reamer and screwing the lid/base on it. Best of all, since it comes apart into pieces, it takes up a lot less room in my kitchen tools drawer than my old-fashioned juicer bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Lunaloon

customer_reviews.title: Best Manual Reamer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Prepara Glass Citrus Juicer for years and I like it so much that I purchased another one for my holiday home. It's a clean easy way to squeeze lemons. And unlike so many other manual juicers, this one is actually sharp and really takes the pulp out of the lemon if that's what you want. I've tried so many others over the years and they're dull and require too much manual pressure. This does the job beautifully with little effort and it's just big enough to store a bit of juice in for later on. Both the plastic top and the glass receptor are of good sturdy quality. Completely dishwasher safe. I'd highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Zombie Apocalypse Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is what we used before they invented those horribly expensive electric juicers and extractors (and I have one of each). Perfect for when assembly, the juicing process, disassembly, cleaning and storage of your big expensive electronic juicing gizmo is too much of a pain. Small - easily stored and transported. Easily and quickly assembled and disassembled. Reliable- no moving parts to break. Requires no electricity or batteries- works during power outages, disasters and the coming zombie apocalypse. And it's inexpensive You know you need one. Don't try to resist.
customer_reviews.author: Booker D

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not terrible
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It's just okay. As other reviewers have pointed out, the white plastic piece (that supports the yellow juicer part) does not screw easily or well to the glass base. Sloppy manufacturing? Whatever. Also, how difficult would it have been to add some measurement marks to the bottom base? That would have raised my rating to 4 stars. As is, it does the job of juicing my lemons well. It's easier on my hands and gets more juice from them than squeezing by hand. Some seeds sneak through, but that's not a big deal to me. If I had it to do again, I'd probably select a different juicer, but this one works for now.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW consumer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome & is very durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this literally everyday. I can't drink water without lemon, so I squeeze a few lemons and store it in this juicer with the lid on. That part is very convenient. It is also sturdy, which is great when you're a clutz like me! The only thing is it lets quite a bit of pulp and some seeds get through, but I think the spaces are probably as small as they can be to still have it work properly. I would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Vada's MommmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better than a handheld!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a small handheld juicer for years and put up with the mess it left on my hands and trying to find something small to keep leftovers in. This is perfect to solve for all of those pain points. No mess juicing, easy pour spout and a lid to save leftovers in same container. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to decide which of the gazillion juicers to get, but this is perfect. It's easy to ream ALL the juice from the citrus, shake the remaining pulp into the glass (if you like the pulp, which I do), and dump the seeds. The juicing component screws on to the glass, but seems to fit perfectly over most of the glasses in my cabinet, so one less thing to wash. Great, sturdy, effective product.
customer_reviews.author: sparklebuggle

customer_reviews.title: It broke during the third use.
customer_reviews.text: The glass container broke during the third attempt at juicing some lemons. This product suffers from either substandard manufacturing or poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: o_O

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I like it as it is BPA free and it is very well made. My 8 year old uses it for his own juices and the size fits him ( a little small for adult hands). However the juice holder is made of glass so you need to be a little careful especially children handling it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy from Singapore

customer_reviews.title: Great little juicer
customer_reviews.text: For a single cup of juice or a bit of lemon/lime juice this is an excellent and sturdy juicer. It is not for a large amount of juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juiciest Juicer - The Name Says It All!
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken, and I requested and received a replacement. BEST JUICER EVER! It extracts juice from lemons and limes leaving them bone dry. I will probably get another one and it is an awesome gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: I love this little juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little juicer! Very easy to store, well designed. This works perfectly for citrus, the strainer catches seeds & excess pulp, the pour spout is very handy and it has a lid for storing the juice! I'll do a whole piece of fruit or two, use what I need for a recipe, then store the rest in the fridge, all in the same container without using more dishes or jars! And the jar is glass so the acids from the citrus can't etch it the way it would with plastic! Perfect, highly recommend this to anyone. This would make a nice gift at a bridal shower or as a housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Love2read660!

product_meta.title: Prepara Glass Citrus Juicer with Storage, Yellow
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Style Name:LemonThis innovative hand juicer by Prepara, the healthy lifestyle brand, allows you to effortlessly juice and store fresh citrus juices. It is perfect for juicing lemons, limes and oranges. The fresh juice flows through an integrated reamer and is collected into the BPA free glass jar base. After juicing, remove the reamer (with pulp and seeds) and pour juice into glasses using the handy integrated spout. A separate lid is included for the glass jar to save the remaining freshly pressed juice. Set includes BPA free reamer and lid and five ounce capacity glass jar/base. All parts are dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Innovative juicer collects and stores freshly pressed juice: 5 ounce/148 ml capacity
Juice reamer includes integrated pouring spout for convenience
The base is made of glass base and a lid included for storing remaining squeezed juice
The jucing reamer features ideal angles for optimal juicing output
This citrus juicer is BPA free and dishwasher safe
